column5: YOU WILL FIND in the DIARIES a LOT of POLITICS AND EVEN MORE CATS     THE PERSON who MAKES the FIRST COMMENT WILL GET TWO CATS EVERY PERSON WHO COMMENTS WILL GET A CAT     RULES IN THE DIARY WHEN YOU FIND SOMETHING in the DIARY that you LIKE YOU CAN REPOST IT AS COMMENT in the DIARY  PRESIDENT JOE BIDEN Jen Psaki: President Biden believes "there should be an investigation" into Florida building collapse.  SUPREME COURT A win for Gavin Grimm: The Supreme Court declined to take up whether schools must allow transgender students to use bathrooms matching their gender identities leaving a victory for Gavin Grimm intact.https://t.co/KqauregiaU  NANCY PELOSI Pelosi on introducing the resolution for a select committee to investigate the Capitol riot: "Senate Republicans did Mitch McConnell a 'personal favor' rather than their patriotic duty and voted against the bipartisan commission ... Democrats are determined to find the truth."  SEN. GARY PETERS Michigan Dem Sen. Gary Peters: "They always try to downplay my abilities to win races and they're always wrong. So I always smile whenever they make those ... statements because I love them to underestimate me because I prove them wrong every time." https://t.co/Ls4CwOGmN3  MITT ROMNEY Romney on CNN: "The election is over. It was fair. Look the president was crying foul on election night and actually before election night. And the question is what were his sources? … Did he hear it from the Justice Dept.? No ... Where did he hear it from? The MyPillow guy?"  ADAM KINZINGER Republican Rep. Adam Kinzinger on Trump's event: "It was a rally of a loser president. I mean he's the first president to lose re-election in decades."https://t.co/9L6m9xySlI  FOX CHRIS WALLACE Fox's Chris Wallace to a Republican congressman: Aren't you the ones defunding the police?"Can't you make the argument that it's you and the Republicans who defunded the police?" https://t.co/dQ97cpUajf  REPUBLICAN MADISON CAWTHORN Republican Madison Cawthorn a self-described 'big history buff' keeps getting basic historical facts wrong.He misattributes presidential quotes.He thinks the Emancipation Proclamation was voted on.He adds signers to the Declaration of Independence.https://t.co/bTXdFdtYJR  ARIZONA Arizona Secretary of State Katie Hobbs on the fake GOP-backed 'audit': "They have no election experience or auditing experience and they're they're making this up as they go along. But they're also using it to continue to spread disinformation." https://t.co/UCcI1LNoOF  IVANKA TRUMP Mother Jones: Documents show Ivanka Trump didn't testify accurately in the inauguration scandal case. She said she played no role in planning inaugural events. Records suggest otherwise. https://t.co/cHJJH9HGGj  TRUMP Prosecutors in New York have given Trump's attorneys a deadline of *this afternoon* to make any final arguments as to why the Trump Organization should not face criminal charges over its financial dealings.https://t.co/iFwd991vGJ
